about.name: Achini G. Wijesingha
about.description: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in frontend development and experienced with all stages of the development life cycle for dynamic web projects. I believe that I'm a proactive person who can easily adapt to new working environment. A strong professional with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at University of Colombo School of Computing, Sri Lanka.
about.descriptionMore: Currently I am working as a Senior Software Engineer at a well known company in Sri Lanka. I love to solve problems in an innovative manner finding easy and better solutions to solve them. I always try my best to bring the best experience to my clients because I believe, clients' satisfaction and positive feedbacks are more valuable than anything in the industry. If you are looking for an outstanding individual to your team, then you are at the right place.

education.school: University of Colombo School of Computing, Sri Lanka

projects.name: Azamara IBE
projects.description: Azamara IBE is a B2C (business to customer) web based system providing a seamless and interactive Cruise plus packaging flow with Cruise, Flights, Transfers, Hotels and Land Tour products. The website has the capability of multiple device responsiveness.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: Angular 7, Angular Library, HTML, Bootstrap 4, SCSS, Sinophia npm

projects.name: Airwaves
projects.description: AirWaves is a B2B (business to business) web based system for travel agents to book Cruise plus holiday packages with Cruise, Flights, Transfers and Hotels.

projects.name: Cache Reporting Tool
projects.description: There is a price cache to store price details of holiday packages and this cache storing millions of data records. So, Cache Reporting Tool was build to analyze the performance and the accuracy of the price cache, and this is a graphical and tabular presentation of cache performance.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: Angular 2, SCSS, Sinophia npm, elasticsearch 5, Micro services architecture, REST web services, Spring

projects.name: Surf Air
projects.description: Surf Air is a demonstration web application providing a facility to book flight plus hotel air packages. Furthermore it has a capability of analyzing hotel reviews and suggesting attractions around the hotel. Personalized results and chatbot are the important features to speed up customer resolution.

projects.name: Surf Hotels
projects.description: Surf Hotels is a demonstration web application providing a facility to book hotel packages. Furthermore it has a capability of analyzing hotel reviews and suggesting attractions around the hotel. Personalized results and chatbot are the important features to speed up customer resolution.

projects.name: Robi Mobile Money
projects.description: Robi Mobile Money is an USSD mobile application for Robi Axiata (Pvt) Ltd. in Bangladesh, which facilitates for fund transferring, utility bill payments via mobile.
